subject: Create an email account for project, event or institution
details:
Department: DETI

Desired email account: GLUA@ua.pt

Project/Event/Institution name: Grupo de Linux da Universidade de Aveiro, Responsible: Miguel Vila

Observations: The Grupo de Linux da Universidade de Aveiro is a group of students and teachers that promote the use of Linux and open-source software in the University of Aveiro. We need an email account to communicate with other groups and institutions.
